Description: Unique identifier for each row in the output dataset
Unique identifier for each referral
Source of the referral (e.g., 'User Sign Up', 'Draft Transaction', 'Lead')
Category of the referral source ('Online', 'Offline', or lead source category)
Local timestamp when the referral was made
Unique identifier of the user who made the referral
Name of the user who made the referral
Phone number of the user who made the referral
Home club of the user who made the referral
Unique identifier of the user who was referred
Name of the user who was referred
Phone number of the user who was referred
Current status of the referral (e.g., 'Berhasil', 'Menunggu', 'Tidak Berhasil')
Number of days granted as a reward for the referral
Unique identifier of the associated transaction
Status of the associated transaction (e.g., 'Paid')
Local timestamp when the transaction occurred
Location where the transaction took place
Type of the transaction (e.g., 'New')
Local timestamp when the referral was last updated
Local timestamp when the reward was granted (null if not granted)
Indicates whether the referral meets all business logic criteria
